entries.meaning: A large, rigid bottle, originally made of glass and mainly used for fermentation, and now commonly made of plastic and used to store liquids.

verbs.description: carboy (third-person singular simple present carboys, present participle carboying, simple past and past participle carboyed)

examples: Juice bottled or carboyed at this high temperature is difficult to cool rapidly because of the danger of breakage of glass.
